title: 10-Year Gifts

embed.description: When we started this journey 10 years ago, we had no idea what Riot and League would become. Luckily, we were carried forward by the passion of a player community that continues to grow and evolve, ten years later. There's nothing more to say beyond thank you.

body:
"Every League of Legends player who has played a game within the last couple of months will receive a new summoner icon along with the Riot Kayle skin. If you don’t own Kayle, you’ll get her, too. If you already own both, you’ll receive a mystery gift. Players who can’t receive mystery gifts will instead receive the RP value of a mystery gift in their region."

Thanks Riot Games! I've only recently got back into playing and a Kayle skin will go down nicely... <3 {{champion:10}}

replies.body: Neither me nor my partner got one, we played games like last week.

> [{quoted}](name=dragon poo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K8sRwOdE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-13T15:20:04.882+0000)
>
> Neither me nor my partner got one, we played games like last week.

"Will receive", it hasn't happened yet.

I got my Rito Kayle skin, played her for first time in over a year.
Get quadra (teammate denied me penta, thats ARAM for ya), thanks Rito.

Only a community like this, can complain about getting stuff for free.
You guys are douchebags.

I love you Rito, thanks for free stuff.

i most likely wont be able to recieve this because of that fucking common launcher bug that shows the logo and then disappears and does nothing. seriously does riot not know how to fix things? i want to fucking play league but if i so as go and play another game for a couple of days it just fucking shuts me out of the damn game.

just... fix your shit.

i was really salty that day huh?
They've given up on trying to fix it and are just going to fix everything with the Alpha Client. No Beta Clients here boys

GREAT I GOT MAFIA MF
I HATE MF
Just got it today, thanks again, Riot.

hello there, is the gift means if u got the kayle then u get the skin, but if u don';t have kayle that means u only receive the champion not the skin? because i only have champion but no riot kayle skin
You'll be getting the skin soon, it hasn't been handed out yet : )
I bought riot kayer skin before and my mystery gift is the summoner icon everyone gets. So sad!!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
You'll get an actual mystery skin soon too, they just haven't been given out yet : )
I just got Kayle given to me, but no Riot Kayle skin yet, how about you guys?
Same here, i wondered if something went wrong with my account. Maybe it will come later?
I already owned Kayle. I got the summoner icon but no skin :/

> [{quoted}](name=shashe23,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K8sRwOdE,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T10:14:20.191+0000)

> I already owned Kayle. I got the summoner icon but no skin :/

I guess they do each item in seperate batches, I can wait for it :)

Riot, I beg you. Please don't give me Riot Kayle/Kayle. I don't mind the free skin, but I don't want another champion. I have OCD and I like having exactly 60 champions on my account. If you randomly give me Kayle and make my roster 61 champions, I legit might quit League of Legends. You don't have to give me anything, I don't want anything. Please just don't give me a champion on this account. Please Riot I beg you.

When you recently became a kayle main
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
